meanings.definition: To give a title or name to something.
meanings.sent1: I will intitle my drawing 'My Pet Dog'.
meanings.sent2: Please intitle your essay before submitting it.
meanings.sent3: The artist decided to intitle his masterpiece 'The Starry Night'.
meanings.sent4: She intitled her new song 'Dreams Unfold' to capture its essence.
meanings.sent5: Remember to intitle your project for easy identification.

meanings.definition: To include a word or phrase in the title of a document or webpage.
meanings.sent1: You should intitle the report with a catchy phrase.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to intitle the blog post with relevant keywords.
meanings.sent3: The student intitled his presentation with a pun to grab attention.
meanings.sent4: She intitled the article with a quote to make it more intriguing.
meanings.sent5: It is important to intitle your webpage for better search results.
